item.title: PRISMING: Blockchain for in-kind donation
item.description:
PRISMING, a nonprofit project for in-kind donation, builds private blockchain platform to enhance transparency and efficiency. This project was supported by Seoul NPO Center. We also collaborated with Ground X, a Korean blockchain lead, and SK Happiness Foundation, a Korean nonprofit organization, for developing a real world case.

In Aug 2018, I gave two talks:

  • New Kids on the Blockchain, WeWork at Euljiro, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 31 Aug 2018.
  • Crypto on the Beach: Blockchain for Good, Naksan Beach Hotel, Yangyang, Gangwon-do, Republic of Korea, 19 Aug 2018.

During the first half of 2019, we collaborated with Ground X and SK Happiness Foundation for a proof-of-concept pilot project for in-kind donation. Details can be found in this public report written by Ground X (http://bit.ly/2019GXReport_Donation_EN).

For the details, please check the project website, http://prisming.io.
